text.0: The delivery will be made to the shipping address indicated by the customer.
text.1: The delivery time is 3-5 working days. We send packages from Monday to Friday; legal holidays are considered non-working days.
text.2: The calculation of the delivery days begins after the delivery confirmation is sent. In case a product is no longer available or for any other reason cannot be sent we will send you a notification.
text.3: For the customed jewelry, the delivery time is up to 15-20 working days.
text.4: The delivery is by courier, and the cost of delivery is 21 lei, for  orders less than 250 lei.
text.5: The cost of delivery is free, if the order is shipped to the city of Alba Iulia
text.6: The cost of delivery is free, if the order is more than 250 lei.
text.7: If you wish to deliver the package outside Romania, the Customer must send an e-mail to the Seller at  {{ mailTo}}, in order to establish the method of delivery. In this case the cost is borne by the Customer.

text.0: If you want to change the product or if you want to receive your money back, we will replace or return your money. You must send us an email at {{ mailTo}} and we will solve it.
text.1: In this situation you are responsible for the transport costs, which are not refundable.
text.2: If the product is defective, the transport costs will be borne by us.
text.3: ⚠️ Please note, custom and personalized items cannot be returned or exchanged! ⚠️ .
